item.title: Bitcoin Breaks $112,000, 24-hour Gain of 1.48%
item.description: On August 27th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin exceeded $112,000, showing a 24-hour percentage change of 1.48%.

item.title: All three major U.S. stock indices turned positive, with the Dow rising 0.27%.
item.description: On August 27th, based on market data, all three major US stock indexes showed an upward trend. The Dow increased by 0.27%, the S&P 500 rose by 0.17%, and the Nasdaq gained 0.11%.

item.title: White House Economic Advisor Pressures Fed Governor Cook, Saying He Should Recuse Himself During the Lawsuit
item.description: August 27th - Presently, Brian Hassett, who is the Director of the White House National Economic Council, declared that Lisa Cook ought to take a leave of absence during the litigation concerning her stance on the Federal Reserve Board. Hassett informed reporters, "If I were in her position, I would immediately take a leave of absence. It is the honorable course of action." Hassett expressed his conviction that the President has the entitlement to dismiss a Federal Reserve Board member like Cook, stating, "The President undoubtedly has the right to dismiss a Federal Reserve Board member on valid grounds, and I believe these allegations hold significant weight."Yesterday, the U.S. President Trump signed a document removing the Federal Reserve Board member Cook from her post, with the effect taking place immediately. Additionally, Trump had previously openly contemplated nominating Hassett as the subsequent Chair of the Federal Reserve.

item.title: ByteDance values TikTok at $330 billion
item.description: On August 27th, according to Reuters, TikTok is valued by ByteDance at $330 billion, yet it has not yet achieved profitability in the US market.

item.title: Suspected Bitmine-Related Address Accumulated 30,422 ETH in the Last 17 Hours, Worth $140 Million
item.description: On August 27th, as monitored by OnchainLens, within the past 17 hours, 4 newly established wallets have accumulated 30,422 ETH from FalconX, which is worth $140 million. These wallets may be related to Bitmine.Addresses:- 0x82Da2afC4281e1B32963b1B1a9A9BA195edcaa76- 0x11508abcb40bcb7E849b0c8Ec3aA178B03bA4801- 0xAf4Cb42584c5Dc74BAFE9bea67d19076538F4B26- 0x566bd75621Db03B4d046e80F87F0A2B489c39Dd3

item.title: A whale today bought 589.5 WBTC and 691.5 ETH, with a total value exceeding 68 million USD
item.description: On August 27th, as monitored by on-chain analyst Yu Jin, a whale has increased its holdings. In the past half hour, it has added $10 million worth of WBTC and $3.19 million worth of ETH. This whale has purchased 589.5 WBTC ($65.4 million) and 691.5 ETH ($3.19 million) today at an average price of $110,947 for WBTC and $4,616 for ETH respectively.

item.title: Monad will integrate Curve on the mainnet launch day
item.description: On August 27th, Monad made an official announcement stating that Curve will be integrated into the mainnet on the launch day.

item.title: Binance Alpha and the contract will launch Hemi (HEMI) on August 29th
item.description: August 27th. As per the official announcement, Binance Alpha is set to launch Hemi (HEMI) on August 29, 2025, at 12:00 (GMT+8). Binance Futures will commence the HEMIUSDT perpetual contract on August 29, 2025, at 12:30 (GMT+8), with a leverage of up to 50x. Users who participated in the Hemi Token Generation Event (TGE) will be able to trade the HEMI token on the Alpha platform and the futures trading platform. Participants of the first phase of the Hemi Booster event can receive and commence trading their HEMI tokens within 8 hours after the start of token circulation.

item.title: Binance Alpha New Round of DOLO Airdrop Single Wallet Profit is Approximately $48
item.description: On August 27th, according to market intelligence, Binance Alpha has initiated the second round of the airdrop of Dolomite (DOLO). Currently, DOLO has a market capitalization of 76 million US dollars. Each eligible user can obtain 166 DOLO tokens in the airdrop. Based on the current price, the estimated value of this airdrop per person is approximately 48 US dollars.

item.title: Swarm Network Completes $13 Million Funding Round, Backed by Sui Foundation
item.description: August 27th: The decentralized validation protocol, Swarm Network, has successfully completed a financing round amounting to $13 million. A portion of the funds for this round was sourced from a public sale of delegation licenses on the Sui Network, which totalled $10 million. In addition, $3 million in strategic capital was obtained from investors including Sui, Ghaf Capital, Brinc, Y2Z, and Zerostage.This financing round is set to expedite the development of its decentralized AI validation protocol.
